comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Hi everyone! We still need 1 Hero/Legendary and 1 Sr. Member. To those who are accepted, please update your avatars and signatures within 24 hours and please read again our general rules especially the boards where your post wouldn't be counted. Please also submit or update your public key or you will not be able to receive your CRP address.We also have new requirements not only you need to post here in the forum but you are also required to
